title: Rolle's Theorem Visualizer
description: Interactive visualization of Rolle's Theorem allowing students to explore functions that satisfy its conditions (continuous, differentiable, equal endpoint values) and see the guaranteed existence of horizontal tangent lines at critical points.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Rolle's Theorem
Mean Value Theorem
Derivatives
Critical Points

educational.learningObjective: Students will explain the geometric meaning of Rolle's Theorem and verify its conditions

controls.name: morphFactor
controls.description: Shape parameter to adjust the function curve

controls.name: showTangent
controls.description: Show or hide horizontal tangent lines at critical points

controls.name: findCriticalPoints
controls.description: Find and display all critical points where f'(c) = 0
